entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed '(*use)->WasMorphed()' during 'Morph - Global' #110960
  • arm64: Assertion failed 'loop->ContainsBlock(pred)' during 'Do value numbering' #110959
  • Assertion failed 'HBtab->ebdTryBeg->HasFlag(BBF_DONT_REMOVE)' during 'Remove empty try-catch-fault 2/3 #110958
  • Assertion failed 'Contains(ancestor) && Contains(descendant)' during 'SSA: liveness' #110957
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'HBtab->ebdTryBeg->HasFlag(BBF_DONT_REMOVE)' in during 'Remove empty try/catch/fault' #110954
    10.0.0
  • [Mono/linux-arm64] int32_t CryptoNative_EvpPKeyBits(EVP_PKEY *): Assertion `pkey != NULL' failed. #110952
  • HttpClient may leak UnobservedTaskException in CheckUsabilityOnScavenge #110951
  • Creation of arrays with negative lengths? #110949
  • [API Proposal]: IReadOnlyMemoryOwner<T> to indicate buffer ownership and provide read-only access #110947

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Implement Read short, int, long and their unsigned versions to stream #110944
  • CultureInfo.TextInfo.IsRightToLeft returns false for Uyghur culture in Blazor WebAssembly #110015
  • ParameterInfo.ToString() is inconsistent with the .NET Framework behavior #110447
  • where `DISABLE_ASSERT_MESSAGES` defined #110941
  • Add ref for folders that are missing one #27762
    Future
  • Unable to execute setcap related programs or functions in .net programs #110946
  • Add managed views of the EE datastructures like MethodTable #10373
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some paramrefs #110956
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Clean up in Number.Formatting.cs #110955
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove redundant 'unsafe' context #110953
    area-Meta
  • Delete unnecessary #pragma warning disable #110948
    area-System.Linq

Merged

  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Code clean up around TryWriteBigEndian/TryWriteLittleEndian #110897
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • JIT: Optimize struct parameter register accesses in the backend #110819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • JIT: split loop headers that are also try entries #110880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Code modernization in System.Linq #110910
    area-System.Linq
  • [Safe code] Clean up Guid.TryFormatX #110923
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Unify Swift parameter register homing with normal homing #110859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • fix browser-wasm debug build #110943
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-Meta, community-contribution

  • zero- and one-element tuples #883

  • Update nullable-reference-types proposal based on 2016-11-16 design notes #3

  • Planning: Working Set Themes #4144

  • Extensions: open issue with "compatible substituted extension type" section #7385
  • Collection expression loophole: ability to invoke .Add() method with the parameter type not matching the collection expression element type #7724

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deconstructed local variable isn't underlined if it's reassigned exactly once in a local function #76570
  • Global using list missing using aliased global usings #76569
  • Slow build and uses 16GB of RAM with a large file and nullable enabled #76568

Closed

  • Peek definition doesn't work on source-generated methods #73970
    17.13
  • Preprocessors are not put on their own line during code formatting #76566

PullRequests

Created

  • Propagate marked attributes to synthesized fields. #76567
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Propagate marked attributes from method type parameters to type parameters of synthesized types. #76492
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Emit opted-in string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in the C# lexer ctor #76544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pass caller argument expression through RoslynDebug.Assert #76435
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Simplify naming style preferences #76411
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extract method cleanup #76550
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CarouselView with CarouselViewHandler2 on iOS, rotate the device and the previous page is selected and cannot scroll back earlier #26833
  • CarouselView with CarouselViewHandler2 on iOS, LinearItemsLayout ItemSpacing is ignored #26832
  • [Windows] Layout could not complete exception arise when using CarouselView PeekAreaInsets Property in OnSizeAllocated method #26822
    Backlog
  • ListView items height are not proper in initial loading with HasUnevenRows set as True. #26820
    Backlog
  • No name is provided for Edit fields: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Proejct_Name Role Value. #26819
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Incorrect role is provided tags, icons and Project options as text: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26817
    .NET 9 SR4
  • No name is provided for "checkboxes", "clear" and "New Task" button: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26816
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Project Section is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26815
    .NET 9 SR4

Closed

  • BKD_Chat #26831
  • FontImageSource Glyph becomes invisible intermittently on Android #25783
    Backlog
  • ImageButton with FontImageSource becomes invisible on ContentPage (but can still be clicked) if you move away from the tab and come back to the tab #14587
    Backlog
  • Wrong page routes in OnNavigated when using GoToAsync with a tab bar #26715
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • ITMS-91061: Missing privacy manifest when publishing my MAUI app to appstore #26827
  • Button always overlaps (infront) of other views #26600
  • Shell.Current.FlyoutBehavior is not taking account in a mixed Flyout Behavior scenario #26302
  • iOS map control intermittent crash #26624
  • BlazorWebView instances never eligible for garbage collection #17717
  • iOS Keyboard Issue: 'Next' Button Missing on Entry #18399
  • Label Text Binding Renders Extra Degree Symbol (°) in .NET MAUI #26630
  • ScrollView Does Not Work When Touching a Custom Grid with PanGestureRecognizer in .NET MAUI (iOS) #26612

PullRequests

Created

  • Tap Events Incorrectly passed Through Button - fix #26834
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enable Catalyst UI Tests with Screenshot Verification #26829
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] List view headers - fix #26826
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 64 #26823
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix [iOS]VerticalOffset Not Reset to Zero After Clearing ItemSource in CollectionView #26818
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [Testing] Fix for flaky test and Improve stability of the VisitAndUpdateItemsSource UITests #26830
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 63 #26806
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [macOS] Remove unused `FilePicker.macos.cs` #26743
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 55 #26710
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 57 #26717
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Update Versions.props 9.0.22 branding #26828
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Simplify iOS ScrollView #26763
    p/1, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 62 #26805
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix for Setting Window.TitleBar to null does not remove the customization  #26568
    community ✨, area-controls-titlebar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • NullReference fix in ShellPageRendererTracker.UpdateTabBarVisibility() #26786
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR4
  • Fixed #26769 - crash when iOS app is running on MacOS #26771
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR4
  • Fix VerticalOffset Update When Modifying CollectionView.ItemsSource While Scrolled #26782
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed ImageButton not honoring Padding value. #26785
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • dotnetcli.azureedge.net -> builds.dotnet.microsoft.com #26787
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • Android shadow performance #26789
    area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR4
  • [Windows] Fix for Exception occurring when using the GroupShortNameBinding in a Grouped ListView #26613
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 2 #26724
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview, area-controls-checkbox, partner/syncfusion
